description: These slow cooker meatballs make a rich, flavourful ragu to enjoy with pasta, as a sub or simply as is.
keywords: Meatballs,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Pork,Slow cooker,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Meatball Ragu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine minces, onion, garlic, parsley, breadcrumbs and egg in a bowl and mix together well using your hands. Roll into large meatballs and place into the slow cooker.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste and chopped basil and season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on low setting for 6 hours.

When ready to serve, preheat grill to high. Transfer meatballs and sauce to a large heatproof dish. Scatter with mozzarella and parmesan. Grill for 6 minutes or until golden. Scatter with extra basil and serve.
